channel.title: Question about SP RS Zip
channel.description:
Right, got bored of taking the bus or getting a taxi to college in the morning so I decided to buy a 'Piaggio Zip SP RS'. For those of you who know a bit about it you'll know it's the race spec'd version with liquid cooling etc, picked it up cheap not a dash more than 850.
I've decided that I'm going to use it for a while then sell it on so I'm going to mod it a bit for a nip more power, I know that there's the restriction in the pipe (Nylon sleeve iirc) and that I can remove a washer for more solid gearing but is there anything else I'd need to do or that you know of that restricts on these scooters?
P.S - By washer I mean that behind behind the two forward pulley plates there's a washer that doesn't allow the pulley to be basically at it's optimum, and the Nylon sleeve is in the exhaust so I can fix that with an aftermarket pipe.
